label: CoordinateSourceSystem
comment: Properties defining a geographical coordinate source system used in different places around the world to identify locations on the earth.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying a type of source for this geographical coordinate source system.

objectProperties.comment: The quantity of signal source available for this geographical coordinate source system.
The quantity of the used signal source of this geographical coordinate source system.

referencedBy.comment: The geographical coordinate source system used for this geographical coordinate.
